title: Information as to pending liquidations.
content: 321.- (1) If where a company is being wound up the winding up is not concluded within one year after its commencement, the liquidator shall, at such intervals as may be prescribed, until the winding up is concluded, send to the registrar of companies a statement in the prescribed form and containing the prescribed particulars with respect to the proceedings in and position of the liquidation. 4 of 166 of 1987. (2) If a liquidator fails to comply with this section, he shall be liable to a fine not exceeding four hundred twenty-seven euros for each day during which the default continues. Unclaimed assets to be paid to Liquidation Account.
